{{Infobox location poe2 | game = poe2 | map = PE2 The Dank Cupboard.png | caption_map = Ground floor | image = PE2 The Dark Cupboard upper.png | caption = Living quarters | name = The Dark Cupboard | type = Building | description = | exits = Arkemyr's Manor | sub_locations = | merchant = Fassina | innkeeper = | inhabitants = Bertenno;Ifren | main_location = Periki's Overlook | plants = | expected_level= 5 | grants_xp = yes | override_xp = | is_crit_path = no | can_camp = no | zone_id = zn_05_artisans_district | internalname = AR_0509_Emporium_01
AR_0510_Emporium_02 | guid = 21c6d0ac-f9b8-42a6-8e1c-a6122367fb72
944961cb-2916-4896-bfb6-c35ccb368416 | lsc = | icon = }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}. ==Background== A high class magic shop in the Overlook, guarded by iron constructs and... An imp? Either way, this is the place to visit for high quality wares, as Archmage Arkemyr spared no expense in supplying it. ==Points of interest== * This is a single chamber filled with shelves containing loot and items. [[The Spine of Thicket Green]] can be stolen from one of the racks. * [[Ifren]], a fortune teller in the corner, will do just that. * The stairs in the center lead to the living quarters, where you can access [[Arkemyr's Manor]] via the window (as part of [[The Archmage's Vault]].) * As of Patch 4.0, the [[Critter Cleaver]], a peculiar machine of Engwithan origin, appears towards the back of the shop. ==Characters== * [[Fassina]], the proprietor. * [[Bertenno]], at the start of [[Velvet Glove, Brass Fist]]. * [[Ifren]], a fortune teller. ==Loot== * [[The Spine of Thicket Green]], [[Sasha's Singing Scimitar]], [[Lethandria's Devotion]], [[Llengrath's Martial Masteries]], [[Grimoire of Vaporous Wizardry]], [[Ring of Focused Flame]], [[Spellkeeper]], [[Gwyn's Bridal Garter]]: Sold by Fassina. * [[Trollhide Belt (Deadfire)|Trollhide Belt]]: In Fassina's chest upstairs. * [[Fassina's Journal]]: In the cupboard upstairs. * {{s3}} [[Fortuneteller's Ear]]: Obtained from [[Ifren]] for [[The Seeking Face's Hunt for the Fortuneteller's Ear]] ==Trivia== * After joining your party, Fassina's job as the shopkeeper is given to a Shop Imp. It sells the same items. ==Gallery== PE2_The_Dark_Cupboard_Exterior.png | Building exterior {{DEFAULTSORT:Dark Cupboard, The}}
title: The Dark Cupboard
